content.text:
# Draft:Amith Mohan Rajeshwari

----
Amith Mohan Rajeshwari is an Indian actor who works in Malayalam Film Industry primarily known for his contribution for Vaazha.
Career
Amith began his acting career from Ben Johnson as Young Ben Johnson back in 2005 as Child Artist. Later he acted on 2022 film Jack N' Jill.
He is also Assistant Director for movie Jack N' Jill and web series Manorathangal. He also directed a music video in 2016 called "Hello- Adele" (A cover song by Bhagya Suresh).
